nl.bioinf.wvanhelvoirt.HadoopPhredCalculator

Class ReadMapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.Mapper<org.apache.hadoop.io.LongWritable,org.apache.hadoop.io.Text,org.apache.hadoop.io.NullWritable,TextArrayWritable>
      • nl.bioinf.wvanhelvoirt.HadoopPhredCalculator.ReadMapper

  • public class ReadMapper
extends org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.Mapper<org.apache.hadoop.io.LongWritable,org.apache.hadoop.io.Text,org.apache.hadoop.io.NullWritable,TextArrayWritable>
    ReadMapper The Mapper class will receive one RecordReader containing reads (one read is 4 lines), and process it. The created array will be wrapped in a TextArrayWritable passed on to the Reducer.

    • Nested Class Summary

        Override method that processes one RecordReader item and send it's output to the reducing step.
        Overrides:
        map in class org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.Mapper<org.apache.hadoop.io.LongWritable,org.apache.hadoop.io.Text,org.apache.hadoop.io.NullWritable,TextArrayWritable>
        Parameters:
        key - LongWritable as key.
        value - Text containing reads (one read is 4 lines) from the fastq file.
        context - Context containing job information.

        java.io.IOException - When something went wrong.
